2. ps - report a snapshot of the current processes

2. ps - report a snapshot of the current processes

ps aux

		
$ ps aux

ps axww

		
$ ps axww
  PID TTY      STAT   TIME COMMAND
    1 ?        Ss     0:01 /sbin/init
    2 ?        S<     0:00 [kthreadd]

2.1. pa axef

[root@development ~]# ps -ef
UID        PID  PPID  C STIME TTY          TIME CMD		
			
# ps axef

2.2. ps -eo pid,cmd

$ ps -eo pid,cmd
